It's one of the ideals a democratic society, and so the fight to attain different kinds of equality, like racial equality, gender equality, or equality of opportunity between rich and poor, is often associated with progress toward that ideal of everyone being truly equal. Equality doesn't have to be used only for social ideals, though. There can be equality in weight between two barrels of apples, or between two molecules.
1[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]（地位、权利、责任等的）均等，平等 Equality is the same status, rights, and responsibilities for all the members of a society, group, or family. ...equality of the sexes.男女平等

translation: vt.装备；具备；准备；穿abbr.装备（=equipment）
examples: (1) They can't afford to equip their army.(2) We must equip the army for the modern war.(3) He is equipped with much experience in teaching.(4) Could you help me equip the caravan?(5) Please equip yourself with a sharp pencil and a rubber for the exam.(6) Did she equip her daughter with the correct boots?
(1) 他们无力装备自己的军队。(2) 我们必须装备军队打现代化战争。(3) 他具有丰富的教学经验。(4) 你能帮我准备好这辆旅行车上的装备吗?(5) 请准备一枝尖的铅笔和一块橡皮参加考试。(6) 她给女儿买的靴子合脚吗?
To equip means to provide something needed for a particular purpose. If you’re planning a trip to the Arctic, you should equip yourself with warm clothes, tents, and two-way radios.

You might want to equip someone with an ice axe for ice climbing and a diving watch for underwater excursions. The ice axe or the diving watch is their equipment. Equip can also be used in a more figurative sense. If you are supposed to write computer programs but have never worked with a computer, you might say that you are not equipped for that. On a really bad day, it might feel like people are not equipped to deal with each other politely.

1[VERB 动词]装备；配备 If you equip a person or thing with something, you give them the tools or equipment that are needed.   [V n with n]  [V n to-inf]  [V n]They become obsessed with trying to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency...他们变得痴迷于给自己的车辆装备小配件，以应付可能出现的各种紧急情况。Owners of restaurants would have to equip them to admit disabled people...餐厅老板将必须在餐厅里配备能够接纳残疾人的设施。The country did not possess the modern guns to equip the reserve army properly.该国没有现代枪炮来给预备役部队提供适当装备。equipped...well-equipped research buildings...设施齐全的研究大楼The greenhouses come equipped with a ventilating system and aluminium screen door...那些温室送来时配有通风系统和铝制纱门。Each caravan is equipped for four persons.每个活动房的设备可供4人使用。2[VERB 动词]（尤指通过教育）使做好准备，使有能力，使有资格 If something equips you for a particular task or experience, it gives you the skills and attitudes you need for it, especially by educating you in a particular way.   [V n with n]  [V n to-inf]  [Also V n for n/-ing]Relative poverty, however, did not prevent Martin from equipping himself with an excellent education...然而，较为贫困的状况并没有阻止马丁让自己接受一流的教育。A basic two-hour first aid course would equip you to deal with any of these incidents.两小时的基础急救课程能够让你有能力处理这类事件。equippedSome students have emotional problems that teachers feel ill equipped to handle...一些学生的情感问题令老师们束手无策。When they leave school, they will be equipped for obtaining office jobs.离校时，他们将有能力获得办公室工作的机会。

translation: n.设备；装备；器材
examples: (1) The government has an interest in importing scientific equipment.(2) We should make a better use of the existing equipment.(3) The equipment must be bought from a supplier approved by the company.(4) The Army is auctioning off a lot of old equipment.(5) I tried to fix the equipment but I failed.
(1) 政府对引进科学设备非常感兴趣。(2) 我们应该更好地利用现有设备。(3) 设备必须从公司认可的供应商那里购买。(4) 军队正在把大量旧装备拍卖掉。(5) 我想把机器修理好，但是失败了。

A motherboard and a graphics processor? Duct tape? A circular saw? A solar panel? Depending on what you’re up to, all these things can be considered equipment, which is whatever you need to complete a task.

Right away you probably notice that a big chunk of the word equipment is made up of another word, the common verb equip — meaning "to provide someone with the tools they need for a specific task." Add equip to -ment (the suffix of choice when you want to turn a verb into a noun) and voilà! Like magic, the verb changes into a noun, and you end up with equipment: the materials you get when you are equipped to do a particular thing.

1[N-UNCOUNT 不可数名词]设备；装备 Equipment consists of the things which are used for a particular purpose, for example a hobby or job. ...computers, electronic equipment and machine tools.计算机、电子设备和机床...outdoor playing equipment.户外游乐设备

translation: n.错误；过失；误差；谬误
examples: (1) He overlooked a spelling error on the first page.(2) An alert listener will have noticed the error.(3) Every man is liable to error.(4) The accident was caused by human error.(5) Human error invoked the disaster.(6) Error analysis of the measurement system is given.(7) After several repetitions there still remains an error.(8) Divination is made up of a little error and superstition, plus a lot of fraud.
(1) 他没有看出第一页中有个拼写错误。(2) 耳朵尖的人能听出这个错。(3) 人人都可能犯错误。(4) 这宗事故是人为过失造成的。(5) 人的过失带来灾难。(6) 给出了次测量系统的误差分析。(7) 重复数次之后仍然存在误差。(8) 占卜是由一些谬误和迷信构成，再加上大量的欺骗。
I'm sorry, sir, there's been some sort of error in the kitchen, is what a restaurant waiter might say to a patron who ordered the fish but was mistakenly served a plateful of worms instead.

Simply put, an error is a mistake. However, that mistake is more likely due to a lapse in judgment or skill than to an accident. A plane crash that occurs after the pilot mistakenly presses the "pilot eject" button is said to be caused by "human error." A baseball play in which the pitcher throws the ball to second base instead of first because he was distracted by a pretty girl in the stands is an error — one that might cost his team the game.

1[N-VAR 可变名词]错误；差错 An error is something you have done which is considered to be incorrect or wrong, or which should not have been done.   [oft N prep]NASA discovered a mathematical error in its calculations...美国国家航空航天局在它的计算结果中发现了一个数学错误。MPs attacked lax management and errors of judgment.议员们抨击管理的松散和判断的失误。2[PHRASE 短语]错误地；失误地 If you do something in error or if it happens in error, you do it or it happens because you have made a mistake, especially in your judgment.   [usu PHR after v]The plane was shot down in error by a NATO missile.一枚北约的导弹误将那架飞机击落。3[PHRASE 短语]（认识到）错误；（意识到）失误 If someone sees the error of their ways, they realize or admit that they have made a mistake or behaved badly.   [PHR after v]I wanted an opportunity to talk some sense into him and try to make him see the error of his ways.我想找个机会开导他一下，好让他认识到自己做错了。

translation: v.爆发；喷发；发疹
examples: (1) Violence has erupted on the streets.(2) The demonstration erupted into violence.(3) An active volcano may erupt at any time.(4) It's many years since Mount Vesuvius last erupted.(5) A rash has erupted all over my back.
(1) 大街上突然发生了暴乱。(2) 示威游行中突然出现了武斗。(3) 活火山随时可能喷发。(4) 维苏威火山上一次喷发至今已有很多年了。(5) 我的背上出满了疹子。
A rash, a volcano, applause, violence, all of these are things that are prone to erupt, meaning they suddenly become active.

The word erupt has origins in the Latin word eruptus, the past participle of erumpere, meaning to burst forth. This lively verb can be used to describe anything that is released in a quick, violent burst, such as a bomb exploding or lava spewing forth from a volcano or even laughter. It can also be used to describe the arrival of things that burst through more quietly (but often more painfully), such as a skin condition or a tooth that’s breaking through one's gum.

1[VERB 动词]（火山）喷发，爆发 When a volcano erupts, it throws out a lot of hot, melted rock called lava, as well as ash and steam.   [V]The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state...那座火山在1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州大片地区。Scientists say Mount Pinatubo could erupt again soon.科学家说皮纳图博山近期可能会再次喷发。eruption...the volcanic eruption of Tambora in 1815.1815年坦博拉山的火山喷发2[VERB 动词]（冲突、战斗等）突然发生，爆发，突然加剧 If violence or fighting erupts, it suddenly begins or gets worse in an unexpected, violent way.   [V]  [JOURNALISM 新闻]Heavy fighting erupted there today after a two-day ceasefire...在停火两天后，今天那里爆发了激烈的战斗。Violence erupted as the boys were driven away in two police vans.两辆警车将男孩们带走时突然发生了暴力冲突。eruption...this sudden eruption of violence.这次暴力事件的突然发生3[VERB 动词]（某地）爆发动乱；（人群）突然暴怒，发生骚乱 When people in a place suddenly become angry or violent, you can say that they erupt or that the place erupts .   [V into/in n]  [Also V]  [JOURNALISM 新闻]In Los Angeles, the neighborhood known as Watts erupted into riots...在洛杉矶，一个叫做沃茨的街区爆发了动乱。This region which had been relatively calm erupted in violence again this spring.已经相对平静的这个地区今年春天再次爆发暴力事件。4[VERB 动词]（感情）迸发，突然转变；（常指）变得狂躁 You say that someone erupts when they suddenly have a change in mood, usually becoming quite noisy.   [V into/in n]  [Also V]Then, without warning, she erupts into laughter...然后在没有任何征兆的情况下，她突然大笑起来。Newman fled barefoot as the cheated husband erupted in fury.被戴绿帽的丈夫勃然大怒，纽曼吓得光着脚逃走了。eruption...an eruption of despair.突如其来的绝望5[VERB 动词]（斑疹等）突然出现，冒出 If your skin erupts, sores or spots suddenly appear there.   [V in/into n]  [Also V]At the end of the second week, my skin erupted in pimples.第二周周末，我的皮肤上突然出现了丘疹。eruption...eruptions of adolescent acne.青春痘的冒出...an unpleasant skin eruption.令人难受的皮疹

translation: n.论文；短评；散文；试图vt.尝试
examples: (1) This essay is admirable in all respects.(2) This essay represents a considerable improvement on your recent work.(3) The teacher geve an essay on his composition.(4) His essay was carried in the June number.(5) In my opinion, essay is more readable than poem.(6) She made her first essays at cooking.(7) He essayed to speak but was told to be quiet.
(1) 这篇文章在各方面都很值得欣赏。(2) 这篇论文说明你最近的工作取得了相当大的改进。(3) 老师给他的作文做了一个短评。(4) 他的散文登载在六月号上。(5) 在我看来，散文比诗歌更具可读性。(6) 她初次尝试做菜。(7) 他试图发言,但主席让他不要讲话。

translation: n.欧洲；欧盟
examples: (1) Africa is exporting beef to Europe.(2) Greece is located in the south of Europe.(3) Ceding sovereignty to Europe is a political hot potato in Britain.
(1) 非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。(2) 希腊位于欧洲南部。(3) 对英国政坛来说，放弃欧盟主权可谓是一块烫手的热山芋。

translation: adj.欧洲的；欧洲人的n.欧洲人
examples: (1) Germany is a European country.(2) The French Revolution was a volcanic upheaval in European history.(3) The meeting once again underlined European reserve.(4) The Japanese have taken over many European ways of life.(5) She is the only European in the class.
(1) 德国是一个欧洲国家。(2) 法国大革命是欧洲历史上的一次剧变。(3) 这次会晤又一次突出表明了欧洲人的守口如瓶。(4) 日本人已袭用了不少欧洲人的生活方式。(5) 她是班上唯一的欧洲人。

translation: vt.评价；评估
examples: (1) Let's evaluate the evidence.(2) The school has only been open for six months, so it's too early to evaluate its success.(3) At the conclusion of the test run, evaluate the test results.(4) If you want to change the order of the questions in your survey, you should first evaluate any impact on the branching.
(1) 让我们评定一下此证据的价值。(2) 这所学校开办还不过六个月，所以要对它的成绩作出评价为时尚早。(3) 在测试完成之后,对测试的结果进行评估;(4) 如果您想更改您的调查中的问题的顺序,则应先评估对分支的任何影响。

translation: adv.最后；终于
examples: (1) It was a long journey, but we eventually arrived.(2) He struggled with his assailants and eventually drove them off.(3) She eventually got back the book she had lent him.(4) Eventually the fire was under control.
(1) 旅程很长，但我们最后还是到达了。(2) 他同攻击他的人进行搏斗，最后把他们赶走了。(3) 她终于收回了借给他的书。(4) 火势终于被控制住了。

translation: adj.日常的；平常的
examples: (1) Slowly insidiously the fog of the everyday has returned to enshroud me.(2) In a bizarre profession anything which belongs to an everyday routine gains great values.(3) He is in his everyday clothes.
(1) 慢慢地，不知不觉地，日常的迷雾又回来笼罩了我。(2) 从事不寻常职业的人，日常生活中任何一件极平常的事物对他都具有不平凡的价值。(3) 他穿着平常的衣服。

translation: n.证据；证词；根据；迹象v.证明；证实
examples: (1) There wasn't enough evidence to prove his guilt.(2) Evidence weighted against the defendant.(3) It is a statement in conflict with other evidence.(4) Have you any evidence to support this statement?(5) Experiment shows no evidence of the production of explosive forces.(6) When the ship reached port, it bore abundant evidence of the severity of the storm.(7) His answer evidenced a guilty conscience.(8) The volcano is still active, as evidenced by the recent eruption.
(1) 没有充分的证据能证明他有罪。(2) 证词很不利于被告。(3) 这一陈述与其他证词不一致。(4) 你这种说法有根据吗?(5) 实验表明,丝毫没有产生爆炸力的迹象。(6) 船抵港时，船上满是受到暴风雨肆虐的痕迹。(7) 他的回答证明他良心有愧。(8) 正如最近的喷发所证明，火山仍很活跃。

translation: adj.明白的；明显的
examples: (1) Now it became evident that he spoke two languages at once.(2) Inertia is evident in our every day experiences.(3) The purpose may not be immediately evident.(4) The rationale for the present study is evident.(5) He looks at twelve children with evident pride.
(1) 现在我才明白，原来他心里一套表面一套。(2) 惯性在我们日常生活中是很常见的。(3) 这种目的不一定显而易见。(4) 该研究的理论基础是明显的。(5) 他带着明显的得意看着12个儿女。

translation: n.进化；发展；演变
examples: (1) Charles Darwin and Alfred Russell Wallace discovered evolution independently.(2) Within 30 years,humans could be debating whether to take charge of their own evolution.(3) Our watchword is: ‘Evolution, not revolution’.(4) In politics Britain has preferred evolution to revolution.(5) Do you know about the evolution of a seed into a plant?
(1) 查尔斯·达尔文和阿尔弗雷德· 罗素·华莱士各自独立地发现了进化论。(2) 不出30年，人类将讨论是否要掌控自身的进化。(3) 我们的口号是: ‘要循序渐进,不要剧烈变革’。(4) 在政治上，英国喜欢渐进而不喜欢革命。(5) 你知道从种子发展成为植物的过程吗？

translation: adj.精密严谨的；确切的
examples: (1) She's a very exact person.(2) We need exact instruments.(3) What is the exact size of the room?(4) It was difficult to tell her exact age.
(1) 她是个一丝不苟的人。(2) 我们需要精密仪器。(3) 这个房间的确切面积是多少？(4) 很难说出她的确切年龄。

translation: vt.检查；调查；考试；仔细观察vi.检查；调查
examples: (1) The doctor examined her carefully.(2) Examine the account well before you pay it.(3) He was unable to examine the issue with detachment.(4) The teacher will examine the students in English.(5) He went to the Congo to examine a new volcano.(6) Examine the falsework of a house.(7) Right mouse button Examine game objects.(8) The OFT will also examine customer satisfaction.(9) It is necessary to examine how the proposals can be carried out.
(1) 医生仔细检查了她的身体。(2) 在付款以前仔细核对一下帐目。(3) 他不能客观公正地调查这一问题。(4) 老师要考学生的英语了。(5) 他曾去刚果察看一座新火山。(6) 检查一座房屋的临时鹰架。(7) 右键鼠标检查物品。(8) 公平交易办公室也会调查顾客的满意度。(9) 有必要调查一下怎样才能实施这些方案。

translation: v.交换；兑换n.交换；交易所；兑换；交战
examples: (1) May I exchange seats with you?(2) You can exchange your car at our nearest office.(3) We exchanged our opinions about the event at the meeting.(4) I'd like to exchange some pounds for dollars.(5) He gave me an apple in exchange of an orange.(6) It seems the exchange rate fluctuates almost daily.(7) A soldier was wounded in the exchange.
(1) 我和你调一个座位好吗?(2) 你可以到我们附近的公司换车。(3) 在会上，我们就此事交换了意见。(4) 我想把一些英镑兑换成美金。(5) 他给我一个苹果，交换一个橙子。(6) 外汇兑换率似乎每天都在上下波动。(7) 一名士兵在交火中受伤。

translation: vt.使兴奋；使激动；刺激；激起
examples: (1) The good news excited everybody.(2) Nothing seemed to surprise or excite him.(3) Strong coffee excites your nerves.(4) The rumors excite her curiosity.(5) Your remark excited him to jealousy.(6) Some people are sexually excited by pornographic magazines.
(1) 这个好消息使每一个人都很兴奋。(2) 好像他对什么事情都不惊讶或兴奋似的。(3) 浓咖啡刺激神经。(4) 谣言引起了她的好奇心。(5) 你的话引起了他的嫉妒。(6) 有的人看到色情杂志能激发起性欲。

translation: n.展览；展示
examples: (1) There will be an exhibition of the development of automobile industry in our country next week.(2) They came from afar to see the exhibition.(3) Such an exhibition of rudeness is absolutely unacceptable.
(1) 下星期将举办一个关于我国汽车工业发展的展览。(2) 他们从远处赶来参观这个展览会。(3) 这样无礼的表现是绝对不能接受的。

translation: v.存在；生存；活着
examples: (1) Most scientists believe that water doesn't exist on the surface of the moon.(2) That department has ceased to exist.(3) The old lady exists only on rice coffee and bread.
(1) 多数科学家认为,月球表面不存在水。(2) 那部门已不复存在。(3) 老太太仅靠咖啡面包生活。

translation: n.存在；生存
examples: (1) The newspaper ceased to appear after an existence of three months.(2) According to some philosopher, everything in existence is reasonable.(3) The family lived a precarious existence.(4) Pollution poses a threat to the continued existence of this species.
(1) 该报发行3 个月后停刊了。(2) 某位哲学家认为，存在的事物都是合理的。(3) 这家人过着朝不保夕的生活。(4) 污染对这一物种的继续生存造成了威胁。

translation: n.出口；退场v.离去；退出
examples: (1) At the roundabout, take the third exit.(2) I was eventually granted an exit visa.(3) He made a quick exit to avoid meeting her.(4) When he stands to exit, he turns and sees Michael for the first time.(5) At the end of the third scene the actress exits.(6) If I fail, I will exit the company.
(1) 在环状交叉路口，从第三条出路驶出。(2) 我终于获得了出境签证。(3) 他迅速离去以避免见到她。(4) 当传教结束后，林肯起身离去时，他第一眼就看见了迈克尔。(5) 该女演员于第三场结束时退场。(6) 如果失败，我将退出该公司。

translation: v.使 ... 膨胀；详述；扩张；增加；张开
examples: (1) Metals expand when they are heated.(2) Would you expand upon the matter a little further?(3) They conferred on the best way to expand business.(4) Our foreign trade has expanded during recent years.(5) The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.
(1) 金属遇热则膨胀。(2) 请你再进一步谈谈这件事好吗?(3) 他们商议扩展业务的最好方法。(4) 近年来我们的对外贸易有所增加。(5) 许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。

translation: n.预料；期望
examples: (1) It is really out of my expectation.(2) His parents have great expectations for his future.(3) She had high expectations of what university had to offer.
(1) 这真是出乎我的意料。(2) 他父母对他的前途深寄厚望。(3) 她对大学所能给她提供的一切期望很高.

translation: n.费用；花费；代价
examples: (1) It's too much of an expense for me to own a car.(2) Societies should try to save every plant and animal species, regardless of the expense to humans in effort, time, and financial well-being.(3) Don't involve yourself in unnecessary expense.(4) He finished the job at the expenses of his health.(5) That's why a reduction in price can never be made at the expense of quality.
(1) 对我来说，拥有一辆汽车的花费太大。(2) 社会应尽力挽救每一动植物物种,不管花费多少人力、时间和财力。(3) 勿做不必要的花费。(4) 他以牺牲健康完成了这项工作。(5) 正因为如此,降低价格的同时,并不能以牺牲质量为代价。

translation: n.试验；实验；尝试vi.尝试；做实验
examples: (1) The researchers are repeating the experiment on rats.(2) The students will have an experiment in the laboratory tomorrow.(3) Fortunately, these folks love to experiment.(4) With Multiple Level Undo you can safely experiment with various what-if scenarios.(5) Small businesses are anxious to experiment with computers.(6) Is he any good at gardening? We might experiment with him.(7) Some scientists experiment on animals.(8) Don't experiment with such dangerous drugs.
(1) 研究人员用老鼠反覆做该试验。(2) 学生们明天要在实验室里做实验。(3) 幸运的是，你们喜欢尝试。(4) 使用多级撤消可以安全地尝试各种假设分析方案。(5) 小型企业都急于试用计算机。(6) 他擅长园艺吗? 我们可以试试他。(7) 有些科学家用动物做试验。(8) 不要用这种危险的药物做实验。

translation: v.说明；解释
examples: (1) She explained her conduct to her boss.(2) He explained his plan in some detail.(3) The lawyer explained the new law to us.
(1) 她向老板说明了自己那种表现的原因。(2) 他仔细地说明了自己的计划。(3) 律师向我们解释了新法律。

translation: n.解释；说明
examples: (1) I made a full and frank explanation to the court.(2) What did he say in explanation of his stupid behavior?(3) There could be some psychological explanation for his bad health.(4) That's not an adequate explanation.
(1) 我对堂上直话直说,从头到尾解释了一番。(2) 他说了什么来解释他那愚蠢的行为？(3) 他的健康不佳可能有心理上的原因。(4) 这并不足以说明问题。

translation: adj.明确的；清晰的；清楚的；露骨的
examples: (1) They gave explicit reasons for leaving.(2) He has an explicit understanding of this.(3) He gave me explicit directions on how to get there.(4) This film will never pass the censors, because it is too sexually explicit
(1) 他们明确地说出了离开的原因。(2) 他对这个了解得很清晰。(3) 他清清楚楚地告诉我怎样到达那里。(4) 这部电影一定不能通过审查这一关,因色情过于露骨。

translation: vi.爆炸；激增；爆发vt.使爆炸；驳倒
examples: (1) The bomb was timed to explode during the rush-hour.(2) When the boiler exploded many people were injured.(3) The firework exploded in his hand.(4) Investment in technology stocks exploded in the 1990s.(5) An active volcano may explode at any time(6) The children exploded three firecrackers.(7) Several scientific myths were exploded by Galileo's observations.
(1) 炸弹选在人最多时爆炸。(2) 因锅炉爆炸，许多人受了伤。(3) 那个爆竹在他手里响了。(4) 二十世纪九十年代的,对科技股票的投资迅速增加。(5) 活火山随时都有可能爆发。(6) 孩子们燃放了三个爆竹(7) 科学上的几种荒诞说法因伽利略的观测而被推翻。

translation: vt.剥削；利用；开发；开拓n.功绩；英勇行为
examples: (1) The capitalists exploit the workers in order to maximize profits.(2) You must exploit all your spare time to learn English.(3) People should read the related regulations before they exploit natural resources.(4) We should look for blank parts in the market and exploit new market continuously.(5) Great men are remembered for their notable exploits.(6) The daring exploits of the soldiers were much admired.
(1) 资本家剥削工人是为了使利润最大化。(2) 你必须利用一切空闲时间来学习英语。(3) 在开发自然资源前，人们应该先了解相关的规定。(4) 我们应找准市场空白,不断开拓新市场。(5) 伟人们因其丰功伟绩而被世人铭记。(6) 战士们的英勇行为令人赞叹不已。

translation: n.输出；出口；输出品；输出存储器的信息v.输出；出口；带走，运走；从存储器输出信息
examples: (1) Prohibition was laid on the export of coal.(2) The company's gearing up for the big export drive.(3) Consultancy, insurance and tourism are also parts of the export trade.(4) Export had suffered during the last six months.(5) Oil has supplanted coffee as our main export.(6) The blood can also export waste products from the tissues.(7) Africa is exporting beef to Europe.(8) They sell to the home market,but they don't export.
(1) 禁止煤炭输出。(2) 公司正为大规模输出作好准备。(3) 咨询,保险及旅游也是出口贸易的一部分。(4) 前6个月内，出口已蒙受损失。(5) 原油已经取代咖啡成为我们的主要出口货物。(6) 血液还能从身体组织里输出废物。(7) 非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。(8) 他们向国内市场销售,但不出口。

translation: vt.揭露；使曝光；使面临；使暴露
examples: (1) The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.(2) I hate the paparazzi.They always expose the people's privacy.(3) We should not expose our children to horrors.(4) Keep indoors and don't expose your skin to the sun.(5) You shouldn't expose the soldiers to unnecessary risks.
(1) 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害。(2) 我讨厌狗仔队,他们老曝光别人的隐私。(3) 我们不应该让孩子看恐怖片。(4) 待在室内,不要把皮肤暴露在阳光下。(5) 你不应该让士兵们冒不必要的危险。

translation: n.快车；快递；专使adj.明确的；急速的；直接的adv.用快递vt.表达；表示；挤压出；快递
examples: (1) The express is as swift as an arrow.(2) We have to change here for an express.(3) I sent the letter by express.(4) Important documents will be sent by express.(5) Is there an express checkout service?(6) It is the most direct way to approach the transcendental state and the most subtle way to express spiritual energy in audible form.(7) The parcel was sent express.(8) Many theologies express the same ideas.(9) I wish to take this opportunity to express my heartfelt gratitude to you again.(10) The writer expresses his love for his motherland in his novels.(11) As soon as I receive payment I will express the book to you.

(1) 快车似箭一般地飞驶。(2) 我们必须在这里换乘快车。(3) 我这封信寄的是快递。(4) 重要文件会以快递寄出。(5) 有没有快速退房手续的服务(6) 这是接近超自然状态最直接的方式，也是用声音来表达灵性能量最精微的方法。(7) 这包裹是用快邮寄的.(8) 许多宗教理论表达同一种思想。(9) 我借此机会再一次地向大家表示衷心的感谢。(10) 作者在小说中表达出他对祖国的爱。(11) 我一收到付款就会将书快递给你。

translation: n.表情；表示；表达；词句；措辞；表现；挤压
examples: (1) He always shows a doleful expression.(2) She gave expression to her sadness.(3) The scenery was beautiful beyond expression.(4) I haven't heard that expression before.(5) The colloquial word is a word or expression often used in informal speech.(6) Art has different forms of expression.
(1) 他总是露出忧郁的表情。(2) 她流露出了悲伤之情。(3) 那风景美丽得无法形容。(4) 我以前从未听到过这个词语。(5) 俗语是在非正式讲话时常用的字或措辞。(6) 艺术有多种不同的表现形式。

translation: n.延长；伸展；延期；扩充；观念发展；增强n.电话分机；特别课程n.[计]文件名
examples: (1) This cord is not long enough! do you have an extension?(2) His leg was now capable of full extension.(3) He asked for an extension of his visa.(4) We built an extension to our house.(5) He sees local history as an extension of family history.(6) There are telephone extensions in every office.(7) Method will only return one unique file name per file name extension.(8) You can optionally filter the list by extension and keyword contained inthe file name, and also choose to include sub-directories.
(1) 这条绳子不够长！你有长一点的吗？(2) 他的腿现在能够伸展自如了。(3) 他申请延长签证有效期。(4) 我们扩建了我家的房屋。(5) 他认为当地的历史是每个人家庭历史的发展。(6) 每间办公室都有电话分机。(7) 方法对每个文件名扩展名只返回一个唯一文件名。(8) 你可以按照包含在文件名当中的扩展名和关键字有选择地过滤列表，并且还可以选择包括子目录。

translation: adj.额外的n.额外之物；临时演员adv.特别地
examples: (1) There were so many people that the company put on extra buses.(2) Guests at this hotel can use the gym at no extra cost.(3) Her school fees are 440 a term; music and dancing are extras.(4) We need hundreds of extras for the battle scenes.(5) We'll give you an extra special discount for buying this merchandise.
(1) 人数太多，公司加开了公共汽车。(2) 这家饭店的客人们可以使用健身房,不再额外收费。(3) 她的学费是每学期440英镑，音乐和舞蹈课另外收费。(4) 我们拍战斗场面需要上百的临时演员。(5) 要是您购买这些商品,我们会给您非常特别的折扣。

translation: adj.非凡的；特别的；特派的
examples: (1) He has an extraordinary memory.(2) His extraordinary skill was praised by all.(3) He is full of extraordinary ideas.(4) He is an a minister extraordinary.
(1) 他有非凡的记忆力。(2) 他超凡的技艺博得了广泛的赞誉。(3) 他满脑子都是离奇的想法。(4) 他是一位特派部长。

translation: adj.极度的；极端的n.极端；极限
examples: (1) Extreme cold can wake a hibernating animal.(2) The extreme heat sapped his strength and health.(3) Extreme poverty had reduced them to a state of apathy.(4) The capital is in the extreme south of the country.(5) His political views are rather extreme.(6) Love and hate are extremes.(7) Starvation is at one extreme of the spectrum of food intake; obesity is at the other.(8) Extreme sports are a drug for him.(9) Another extreme sport is snowboarding.
(1) 极度的寒冷能使正在冬眠的动物苏醒。(2) 极度的暑热逐渐损耗他的体力兴健康。(3) 极端的贫困使他们万念俱灰。(4) 首都在这个国家的最南端。(5) 他的政治观点相当极端。(6) 爱和恨是两个极端。(7) 饥饿是食物摄入量的一个极端,肥胖则是另一个极端。(8) 他酷爱极限运动。(9) 另外一个极限运动的例子则是滑雪。

translation: adv.非常；极其
examples: (1) I'm extremely sorry.(2) He knows the area extremely well.(3) He is an extremely frank person.(4) It pains me extremely to have to leave you.(5) This task is extremely difficult.
(1) 我非常非常抱歉。(2) 他对这个领域了解的非常透彻。(3) 他是个极其老实的人。(4) 不得不离开你，这使我极感痛苦。(5) 这项任务极其困难。

translation: n.视力
examples: (1) Is your eyesight failing recently?(2) The eye drops will help to improve your eyesight.
(1) 你近来视力有所变差吗？(2) 这种眼药水能改善你的视力。

translation: n.目击者；见证人
examples: (1) He was the only eyewitness of the robbery.(2) One eyewitness is better than ten earwitnesses.
(1) 他是那起抢劫案的唯一目击者。(2) 一人目击，胜过十人听到。

translation: adj. 每；各自的adv. 每个；各自pron. 每个；各自
examples: We each have our private views about it.I asked all the children and each told a different story.Each of them had his little local personal history.We each paid our share of the bill for the meal.Each day passed without any news.Each man has his own name.He examined each piece of evidence in isolation.
我们每个人对这件事都有自己的看法。我问过所有的孩子，每个人的说法都不一样。他们每一个人都有过一段默默无闻的个人历史。我们各自付了自己应付的那份饭钱。每天都没有任何消息.每个人都有自己的名字。他分别审查每一证据。

translation: n. 耳朵；穗；听觉；倾听vi. （美俚）听见；抽穗n. (Ear)人名；(柬)伊
examples: She plays the piano entirely by ear.If this news ever reaches her ears, she'll be furious.He gave the boy's ear a painful tweak.The dog's ear pricked up at the sound.He tried to give a sympathetic ear to the patient.They bent an ear to our request for aid.Some people like eating the ear of wheat.The corn will soon ear.Soon the seedings shot up and began to ear.
他演奏钢琴完全凭听觉记忆,不用乐谱。这个消息万一传到她的耳朵里，她一定得大发雷霆。他用力拧了一下那男孩的耳朵。狗听到声音后竖起了耳朵。他极力怀着同情心倾听患者的叙述。他们仔细倾听我们求援的请求。有些人喜欢吃麦穗。玉米不久就要结穗了。秧苗很快长起来,并开始抽穗。

translation: adj. 早期的；早熟的adv. 提早；在初期n. (Early)人名；(英)厄尔利
examples: They figured on your arriving early.The apple trees are fruiting early this year.Could you come back home early this evening?John will doubtless come early as he always does.It's too early for getting up.This Greek dish is of a very early date.Please make every endeavor to be early.His genius as a painter flowered very early.He got skinning in his blood at a very early age.
他们预料你会早到。今年苹果树很早结果。今天晚上你能早回家吗？约翰无疑会像平时一样很早就来。现在起床还太早。这个希腊盘子是很早时期的制品。请尽量早点儿。他的绘画天赋很早就发挥出来。他很早就迷上了，滑雪运动。

translation: n. 地球；地表，陆地；土地，土壤；尘事，俗事；兽穴vt. 把（电线）[电] 接地；盖（土）；追赶入洞穴vi. 躲进地洞
examples: The moon goes round the earth.What percentage of the earth is covered by oceans?He dived his hand into the earth.The machine cast up a big heap of earth.The earth is as full of brutality as the sea is full of motion.There is no paradise on the earth equal to the union of love and innocence.
月亮绕着地球转。地球上百分之多少被海水覆盖着？他将手插入泥土中。机器卷起了一大堆泥土。世间满是残忍，正如海洋满是波动一般。世间无与伦比的幸福就是既有爱情又爱得纯洁无瑕。

translation: n. 东方；东风；东方国家adj. 东方的；向东的；从东方来的adv. 向东方，在东方n. (East)人名；(英)伊斯特
examples: Take the east road, it's the shortest way.He traveled east.China is in the east of the world.The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.I was born in the east, but now live in Los Angeles.Our school is in the east of Beijing.
走东边这条路吧,这是最近的路。他向东旅行。中国位于世界的东方。太阳从东方升起，在西方落下。我出生于东部，但现在住在洛杉矶。我们学校在北京的东部。

translation: adj. 容易的；舒适的adv. 不费力地，从容地vi. 停止划桨vt. 发出停划命令
examples: It's not easy to rid oneself of a habit.Her movements were easy and graceful.It was not easy for me to get the rusty nail out.He has stopped working and leads a very easy life now.He began to pursue an easy and comfortable life.Our teacher is easy on the girls and hard on the boys.He has an easy way of speaking.She's definitely not a woman of easy virtue.
要改掉一个习惯是不容易的。她的动作轻松而优雅。我好不容易才拔出这颗生锈的钉子。他现在不做事了,过着很舒服的日子。他开始追求安逸舒适的生活。我们老师对女生宽，封男生严。他说话的语气随和。她决不是一个放荡的女人。

translation: vt. 吃，喝；腐蚀；烦扰vi. 进食；腐蚀，侵蚀
examples: I often eat oatmeal as breakfast.Do you always eat lunch at school?If you eat too much chocolate you'll get fat.The Chinese eat with chopsticks.They usually eat out on Sundays.Do you like to eat vegetable soup?
我经常吃燕麦粥当早饭。你总是在学校吃午饭吗？吃巧克力太多会发胖。中国人用筷子吃饭。星期天他们通常上馆子吃饭。你喜爱喝清菜汤吗?

translation: n. 边缘；优势；刀刃；锋利vt. 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边vi. 缓缓移动；侧着移动n. (Edge)人名；(英)埃奇
examples: Look out! You could fall off the edge here!New houses have mushroomed on the edge of the town.In the second half of the game, the home team got the edge on the visitors and kept it.Because of the high exchange rate, our products have lost their competitive edge.Don't bump the door with the edge ot the table.Please sharpen the edge of this axe.She lost a handkerchief edged with blue.We slowly edged our way towards the exit.You'll have to edge the knife, it's blunt.Unemployment will edge up, but not by much.
小心!你会从这边缘掉下的。城市边缘的新建房屋犹如雨后春笋。比赛下半场,主队比客队略占上风,并把这一优势保持到终场。由于汇率很高, 我们的产品失去了竞争优势。不要让桌子边碰到门上。请把这把斧头的刃磨快。她丢了一块镶蓝边的手绢。我们向出口缓慢移动。你得把这刀磨一磨,它钝了。失业率将缓慢上升，但增幅不是很大。

translation: n. 教育；培养；教育学
examples: Education develops potential abilities.No country can afford to neglect education.Our teacher expounded his views on education to me at great length.He was handicapped by lack of education.He has a master's degree in education.
教育能开发人的潜能。任何国家都不容忽视教育。我们的老师向我详细讲述了他的教育观点。他因文化水平低而吃了亏。他有教育学硕士学位。

translation: n. 蛋；卵子；家伙；鸡蛋vt. 煽动；怂恿n. (Egg)人名；(法、英)埃格
examples: The egg nestled in the long grass.The black hen lays an egg a day.The tadpole hatches from the egg.The egg hatches into a larva (caterpillar).You start your life in an egg like this.Chocolate egg is traditionally eat on Easter day.Egg mayonnaise is made with mayonnaise and hard-boiled eggs.Don't let him egg you on--you shouldn't take any notice of him.Don't egg him on to play a trick on others.Why do you egg him on to do what you won't do yourself?
蛋隐藏在高草中。那只黑母鸡每天生一个蛋。蝌蚪从卵中孵化出来。卵孵化成了幼虫（毛虫）。你的生命从这样的一个卵开始。人们按传统吃巧克力彩蛋庆祝复活节。鸡蛋美乃滋是用蛋黄酱和煮老的鸡蛋做成的。别听他煽动，你根本就不要去理睬他。不要怂恿他捉弄别人。你自己不干,为什么撺掇他呢?

translation: num. 八；八个；第八adj. 八的n. 八字形
examples: I'm hardly functional if I don't get eight hours' sleep!You are restricted to eight liters of duty-free wine.There are eight forts in this section of the Great Wall.Five members voted for the proposal, eight voted against, and two abstained.I am sorry, you can only buy traveler's check at Window Eight.His eight sons largely inherited his fortune.There are eight students in the classroom.
我要是不睡上八个小时就无法工作。携带的免税酒不得超过八升。这一段长城有八个垛口。对于这项建议，五人投票赞成，八人反对，两人弃权。对不起，你只能在八号窗口买旅行支票。他的八个儿子继承了他的大部分遗产。教室里有八个学生。

translation: adj. 第八的；八分之一的num. 第八；八分之一
examples: He was the eighth to break the record.Eighth, we must go on opposing Han chauvinism.
他是打破该记录的第八人。第八，要继续反对大汉族主义。

translation: adj. 两者之中任一的；两者之中每一的prep. 任何一个conj. 也（用于否定句或否定词组后）；根本pron. 任一，两方，随便哪一个；两者中的一个或另一个
examples: The thief was put in the police car with a policeman on either side of him.You may take either of the roads.It's not as heavy, either.If you do not go, I shall not go either.I will go on business either this week or next week.Either we will find a supply, or we will make the goods.
窃贼被送到警车上，身旁各坐着一个警察。两条路你随便走哪一条。这也不那么重。你不去，我也不去。我将在这星期或下星期出差。我们或是寻求供货，或者自己制造。

translation: adj. 电子的n. 电子电路；电子器件
examples: This dictionary is available in electronic version.I like to read books on electronic music.Helen became an electronic engineer.
这部词典有电子版。我喜欢读一些关于电子音乐的书。海伦成了一名电子工程师。

translation: n. 象；大号图画纸
examples: The elephant smashed through the trees.He said he could eat an elephant to appease his hunger.Jan's factory is an absolute white elephant.
大象在树林中横冲直撞。他说他吃光一头大象才能充饥。简的那个工厂成了一个大包袱。

translation: n. 十一；十一个adj. 十一的；十一个的num. 十一；十一个
examples: The meeting broke up at eleven o'clock.Mr Hood said that he would have to go on, as he was due at a meeting at eleven o'clock.Not until eleven o'clock did he come home.I have received eleven Christmas cards by now.A cricket team is comprised of eleven players.There are eleven players in the game.There are eleven members in the team.The little boy left primary school at eleven.There are eleven in the room.
会议在十一点钟散会。胡德先生说由于他11点钟要出席一个会议，得先走一步了。他到十一点才回家。到现在为止，我已经收到了十一张圣诞卡片。一个板球队由11名队员组成。这场比赛中有11名选手。队里有十一个人。这个小男孩十一岁时小学毕业。屋里有十一个人。

translation: adv. 其他；否则；另外adj. 别的；其他的n. (Else)人名；(英)埃尔斯；(德)埃尔泽；(芬、丹)埃尔塞
examples: Ask somebody else.Would you like anything else to drink?Yesterday, we went to the department store and nowhere else.Hurry, or else you'll be late.You will stay away from my girlfriend, or else.
问问别人。你还要喝点别的什么吗?昨天我们到百货公司去了, 其他什么地方也没去。快点儿，不然你要迟到了。离我女朋友远点,否则要你好看。

translation: n. 电子邮件发电子邮件
examples: Electronic mail,for instance,has improved management efficiency tremendously.Electronic mail will soon play a dominant role in transmittingmessages.
拿电子邮件来说，现在和没有电子邮件的时代是完全两样。电子邮件很快会在信息传输方面起主导作用。

translation: 电子邮件电子函件
examples: Electronic mail,for instance,has improved management efficiency tremendously.Electronic mail will soon play a dominant role in transmittingmessages.
拿电子邮件来说，现在和没有电子邮件的时代是完全两样。电子邮件很快会在信息传输方面起主导作用。

translation: adj. 空的；无意义的；无知的；徒劳的vt. 使失去；使…成为空的vi. 成为空的；流空n. 空车；空的东西
examples: His room is empty.His wordy and empty speech was a frost.He didn't want to retire and lead an empty life.This medicine must be taken on an empty stomach.I feel jolly empty!They emptied the biscuits onto the plate.He tilted the barrel so as to empty it.Getting gorgeous doesn't mean you have to empty out your wallet.I had to empty out the drawer to find the papers.Did you empty the washing machine?The police asked everybody to empty the building.You don't mind if i ask you to empty your pockets.Would you empty the ashtray, please?Empties are not taken back.
他的房间是空的。他的冗长空洞的讲话使人厌烦。他不想退休过空虚的生活。这种药必须空腹服用。我饿极了!他们把饼干倒在盘子里。他将大桶倾侧倒空。想让自己光彩照人并不意味着要掏空腰包。我不得不倒出抽屉的东西以找出那些文件。你把洗衣机的衣服都拿出来了吗?警察疏散了楼里的人群。你不介意我搜一下你的口袋吧?请你把烟灰缸清理一下好吗?不退瓶子。

translation: vt. 鼓励，怂恿；激励；支持
examples: Her success encouraged me to try the same thing.Her parents encouraged her in her studies.He aims to encourage mutual understanding.Broadband support flat salary structure, to encourage their staff to study hard.In some places, the local government underlets land to encourage private education.
她的成功鼓励我尝试做同样的事。她的父母鼓励她好好学习。他的目的在于增进相互了解。宽带薪酬支持扁平型结构，鼓励员工努力学习。在有些地方，政府廉价出租土地支持民办教育。

translation: n. 结束；目标；尽头；末端；死亡vi. 结束，终止；终结vt. 结束，终止；终结n. (End)人名；(英、德)恩德
examples: The battle finally brought the war to an end.At the end of the film, the hero wept bitterly.He makes a knot in the end of the string.He could have achieved his ends by peaceful means.He came to an untimely end by accident.We need someone to handle the marketing end of the business.Jean is going to meet me at the other end.I answered the phone but there was no one at the other end.The teams changed ends at half-time.He threw his cigarette end on the floor.He came to an untimely end.He met his end at the Battle of Waterloo.The debate ended in uproar.They ended the party off with a song.
这一仗使这场战争终告结束。在影片的结尾，主人公伤心地哭了。他在绳子末端打了个结。他要是采用和平手段的话就会完成他的目标。他遭不测而过早死亡。我们需要有人管理本公司的销售部。琼打算在那边终点站接我。我接了电话，但线那头没有人。上半场结束时双方交换了场地。他把烟头丢在地上。他英年早逝。他在滑铁卢战役中阵亡。那场争辩以大吵大闹收场。他们唱支歌结束了晚会。

translation: n. [物] 能量；精力；活力；精神
examples: Young people usually have more energy than the old.Don't waste your time and energy on trifles.Auckland is a city full of energy.The industry felt the effects of the energy crisis.He gave a lecture on the use of solar energy.
青年人通常比老年人精力充沛。别把你的时间和精力浪费在琐事上。奥克兰是个充满活力的城市。该工业受到能源危机的影响。他就太阳能的利用作了一场讲演。

translation: n. 工程师；工兵；火车司机vt. 设计；策划；精明地处理vi. 设计；建造
examples: Hs is a civil engineer.His dream is to become an engineer.He is a locomotive engineer.The road is very well engineered.They are engineering a bridge.It's his father who engineered the plot.
他是位土木工程师。他的梦想是将来成为一名工程师。他是一名火车司机。这条路设计得很好。他们正在建造一座桥。是他爸爸策划的这个阴谋。

translation: n. 英格兰
examples: The big match tonight is England versus Spain.Rocks often crop out in New England pasture land.The Queen of England lives in Buckingham Palace.England and Spain waged war for many years.
今晚的大赛是英格兰对西班牙。在新英格兰的牧场上常可见到露在地面上的岩石。英国女王住在白金汉宫。英国和西班牙曾打过多年的战争。

translation: adj. 英国人的；英国的；英文的n. 英语；英国人；英文；英格兰人vt. 把…译成英语
examples: He spares no efforts to study English.It is important for us to learn English.The English are often regarded as being cold and reserved.She has a good grasp of the English language.Hunting foxes is a peculiarly English sport.The English countryside looks at its best in spring.
他不辞劳苦地学习英语。学习英语对我们来讲是很重要的。人们往往认为英国人冷漠且保守。她精通英语。猎狐是英国人特有的运动。英国的乡村在春天景色最美。

translation: adj. 说英语的
examples: Australia is an English speaking nation.Switzerland is not English speaking country.
澳大利亚是一个讲英语的国家。瑞士不是英语国家。

translation: vt. 欣赏，享受；喜爱；使过得快活
examples: Now that I am free, I can enjoy music for a while.They enjoy the fruits of their hard labor.How did you enjoy the concert?I enjoy reading Mark Twain's autobiography.
既然有空，我可以享受一下音乐。他们享受自己辛勤努力的成果。你喜欢那场音乐会吗？我喜欢读马克•吐温的自传。

translation: adj. 快乐的；有乐趣的；令人愉快的
examples: I do not think that movie is very enjoyable.In fact, life gets more enjoyable as you age.We all had an enjoyable evening.The hotel staff spares no pain to ensure that our stay is as enjoyable as possible.
我看那部电影并不怎么有趣。事实上，生活随着时间的流逝变得更有趣。我们全都度过了一个愉快的夜晚。旅馆工作人员对我们照顾得无微不至，尽量让我们住得舒适。

translation: adv. 足够地，充足地n. 很多；充足adj. 充足的int. 够了！
examples: I haven't enough time for reading.He has enough money (=money enough) to buy a car.John's old enough to take care of himself.He is brave enough to face dangers.He is competent enough to fill that position.He was careful enough to check up every detail.He seemed pleasant enough to me.I've had enough of that.I'm afraid I've eaten more than enough.
我没有足够的时间读书。他有足够的钱买一辆汽车。约翰长大了,能照顾自己了。他很勇敢,足以面对各种危险。他完全胜任那个职位。他非常仔细，把每一个细节都核对过了。他对我似乎已相当和气了。我真受够了。我怕我是吃得过多了。

translation: vt. 进入；开始；参加vi. 参加，登场；进去n. [计] 输入；回车n. (Enter)人名；(英)恩特
examples: Please do not enter before knocking on the door.He has no choice but enter that college.He showed me how to enter data into the computer.
进来前请先敲门。他不得不进入那所大学读书。他告诉我如何将数据输入电脑。

translation: n. 入口；进入vt. 使出神，使入迷
examples: There is an entrance just around the corner.I'll meet you at the entrance of the zoo tomorrow.A lighthouse marks the entrance to the harbour.The actress makes her entrance in Act 3.The singer's entrance was greeted with applause.The police were unable to gain entrance to the house.Guests have free entrance to the swimming pool and the health club.Her beauty entirely entrances him.This gift is bound to entrance any child.
拐角处有个入口。明天我会在动物园的入口处和你见面。灯塔是进入海港航道的标志。女演员在第三幕登场。那位歌星在掌声中登场。警方未能得到进入这栋房子的许可权。客人们可以免费进入游泳池和健身房。她的美丽完全使他入迷了。这件礼物任何小孩看了都会欣喜若狂。

translation: n. 环境，外界
examples: She is not used to the new environment.We are required by environment protecting department to use anthracite.At one time, children didn't have to learn any more than how to cope with their physical  environment.
她对新环境不习惯。环保部门要求我们使用无烟煤。曾经有一段时间,儿童除了学习适应外界环境以外,什么都不学。

translation: n. 橡皮；擦除器；[计] 清除器
examples: The eraser is in the pencil-box.Life is to paint without an eraser.
橡皮擦在文具盒里面。生命是绘一幅画，手中却无橡皮擦。

translation: vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出n. 逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏
examples: The prisoner has escaped.To my surprise, he could escape from that big fire.I had left England to escape from my own future.They came to America to escape political tyranny.His name escapes me right now.It had not escaped my attention that Joseph was absent.About five tonnes of crude oil had escaped into the sea.We are hoping to escape to the Algarve in May.The thief jumped into a car and made his escape.Our escape was little short of miraculous.He sought escape in the bottle from hard realities.Dancing and reading are wonderful escape.They tried to stop the escape of gas from the damaged pipe.To exit a screen or dialog box, press the escape button.
犯人逃走了。令我惊讶的是,他能够从那场大火里逃脱出来。我离开英国是为了逃避自己的命运。他们为逃避暴政逃到了美洲。他的名字我一时想不起来。我注意到约瑟夫没有来。约5吨原油泄露到了海里。我们希望5月去阿尔加维度假。小偷跳上汽车逃走了。我们能逃脱简直是个奇迹。他常常借酒消愁来逃避残酷的现实。跳舞与阅读都是很好的逃避方式。他们试图阻止气体从损坏的管道中泄露出来。按推出键可以推出当前屏幕或对话框。

translation: adv. 特别；尤其；格外
examples: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.The rising sun is especially beautiful to look at from this angle.I love the country, especially in spring.Christmas is a time of mirth, especially for children.Noise is unpleasant, especially when you are trying to sleep.
他们的主要出口货物是纺织品，特别是丝绸和棉布。旭日从这个角度看起来特别美。我喜欢这乡村，尤其是在春天。圣诞节是个快乐的日子，尤其是对孩子们。噪音令人讨厌，尤其当你想睡觉的时候。

translation: adj. [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的adv. 甚至；即使；还；实际上vt. 使平坦；使相等vi. 变平；变得可比较；成为相等n. (Even)人名；(法)埃旺；(德)埃文；(英)埃文
examples: A billiard-table must be perfectly even.He spoke lightly in even tones.Cars with license plates ending in even numbers must go in this way.He has an even chance of success.He didn't even have the decency to show me the way.Even the best of men ignored that simple rule.Even as he spoke, she entered.He even more likes to drink wine and not to like beer.It was even as he said: the jewel was gone.The path ran steeply up the hill and then evened out.I will pay for the taxi , to even things up .
台球桌必须十分平.他以平和的语调温和地讲话。牌照以偶数结尾的汽车必须走这条路。他成败的机会参半。他甚至连指点我路的礼貌也没有。甚至最优秀的人也忽略了那条简单的规则。正当他说话时，她进来了。他更愿意喝葡萄酒而不喜欢啤酒。正如他所说的，珠宝不翼而飞了这条路很陡，到山上就平坦了。我将付出租车费，以使得失相等。

translation: n. 晚上；傍晚；（联欢性的）晚会；后期adj. 在晚上的；为晚上的；晚上用的int. 晚上好（等于good evening）
examples: Could you come back home early this evening?I had a severe headache that evening.In the evening we went to see a film.The evening sky flamed with red and orange.They rounded off the evening by singing a song.
今天晚上你能早回家吗？那天晚上我头特别疼。晚上我们去看了一场电影。傍晚天空的颜色是一片火红和橘黄相间。他们唱了一首歌，圆满结束了这个晚会。

translation: n. 事件，大事；项目；结果
examples: It was quite an event when a woman first became prime minister.The new book was the cultural event of the year.Don't get caught up in this event.This article discussed the events that led to her suicide.Jeff: Wang Ping, What is the sports event that catches the most attention in China?Modern pentathlon became an Olympic event in 1912.
首次由女人任首相倒是件大事。这本新书的出版是今年文化界的大事。不要卷入这个事件。这篇文章讨论了导致她自杀的一系列事件。杰夫：王平，中国最受关注的的体育项目是什么?现代五项在1912年被列为奥运会项目。

translation: adv. 永远；曾经；究竟n. (Ever)人名；(英)埃弗；(俄)叶韦尔；(西、法)埃韦尔
examples: I don't think I ever met you.Have you ever been to Beijing?Nothing ever happens in this village.Who ever can it be?What ever is she doing?They were very happy ever afterwards.I wish I could live here for ever.
我觉得我没见过你。你去过北京吗?这村里从来没有发生过什么事情。那究竟会是谁呢?她究竟在做什么?以后他们一直幸福地生活着。我希望自己能永远住在这儿。

translation: adj. 每一的，每个的；每隔…的n. (Every)人名；(英)埃夫里
examples: Every citizen should be obedient to the law.He received the fixed dole every month.I have had to work for every single penny I earned.He has read every book on the shelves.She snatched at every chance to practice her oral English.We have every reason to think he may still be alive.He comes to see us every three days.The milkman comes every other day.Miss Powel went to town every third day.They showed us every attention.The athlete had every hope of succeeding.
每个公民都应当是遵守法律的。他每个月都能领到固定的救济金。我挣的每一便士都是辛苦工作得来的。书架上所有的书他都读过了。她把握一切机会练习英语口语。我们有充分理由认为他可能还活著。他每隔三天来看我们一次。送牛奶的人每隔一天来一次。鲍威尔太太每隔两天上街一次。他们向我们表示了最大的关注。这名运动员对成功抱以很大的希望。

translation: pron. 每个人；人人
examples: Everybody should do good self work.It is difficult to find a time that suits everybody.The rascal was hated by everybody in the village.Everybody else has gone home except me.Everybody has his own view of what happened.The benediction closes the service, and then, as the organ plays a postlude, everybody turns to greet his neighbors.
每人必须做好自己的工作。很难找到一个对每人都合适的时间。这坏蛋，村子里人人痛恨。除我之外，人人都回家了。对於所发生的事情，各人有各人的看法。最后以祈祷祝福结束了礼拜，在风琴弹奏中，各人都转向邻座的人招呼问好。

translation: pron. 每个人；人人n. 每个人
examples: On this job everyone works straight-time.The ruling was not fair to everyone.Everyone should be guarded by legal barricades.The justice of these remarks was clear to everyone.
在这项工作中，每人干满正常工作时间。这项裁决并非对每人都公正。人人都应受法律保障。人人都明白这些话是公正的。

translation: pron. 每件事物；最重要的东西；（有关的）一切；万事
examples: Thank you for everything.Money isn't everything.His standard for everything is excellence.I resent having to get his permission for everything I do.I remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.Everything in the capital is now quiet.I found everything in good order.Has everything been allowed for in your plan?In business, timing is everything.
感谢你做的一切。金钱不是一切。他对所有事物的标准是卓越。我讨厌做每件事都要得到他的许可。我对发生的每件事的细枝末节都记得清清楚楚。目前首都的形势很平静。我发现一切情况良好。你的计划是否把各种情况都考虑进去了?在商业中,时间就是最重要。

translation: adv. 到处n. 每个地方
examples: New factories are going up everywhere.I hunted for my book everywhere.
到处在兴建新工厂。我到处找我的书。

translation: adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地
examples: The train arrived at exactly 8 o'clock.Can you date the fossil exactly?I hold exactly the same idea as you.You have to do exactly as he said.You've arrived at exactly the right moment.
火车八点钟准时到达。你能确定这化石的确切年代吗?我的想法同您的完全相同。你必须严格按照他说的去做。你到得正是时候。

translation: n. 考试；测验
examples: He repeatedly fails to pass the exam.I was really in a fog after the exam.He didn't pass the exam, but it was a good attempt.She crammed for her history exam.Don't be unduly worried about the exam.
他考了多次都不及格。考完试后，我真的感到稀里糊涂。他虽然没有通过考试，但他做了很大的努力。她死记硬背以应付历史考试。不要过分担心考试的事。

translation: n. 考试；检查；查问
examples: The issue needs further examination.None of these explanations can stand up under close examination.I have no other wish except to pass the examination.The examination of all the witness lasted two hours.The doctor gave him a careful examination.Close examination revealed a crack in the vase.
这个问题需要进一步考查。这些解释没有一个能经得住严格的考查。我除了要通过考试之外，没有别的心愿。对全部证人的讯问持续了两个小时。医生对他作了彻底的检查。花瓶经仔细检查发现有裂缝。

translation: n. 例子；榜样vt. 作为…的例子；为…做出榜样vi. 举例
examples: It is a classic example of how not to design a new city centre.This church is a classic example of medieval architecture.Her diligence has set an example to the others.Comrade LeiFeng set us a good example to emulate.I must set an example to this young friend.Many great men have risen from poverty---Lincoln, for example.This dictionary has many examples of how words are used.Can you give an example of how you would do that?Let this be an example to you.He can set a good example for Chinese coaches.In fact Ukraine offers them a proud example.
这对设计新市中心是个最佳的反面教材。这座教堂是中世纪建筑风格的典型实例。她的勤奋为其他人树立了榜样。雷峰同志为我们树立了可供效仿的榜样。我一定要给小朋友做个榜样。许多伟人从贫困中崛起，例如林肯。这部词典有许多说明词语用法的实例。你能否举例说明你将怎样去做?你要以此为鉴戒。他可以为中国教练做好的示范。可实施上乌克兰给俄罗斯做了很好的示范。

translation: adj. 卓越的；极好的；杰出的
examples: She would have made an excellent teacher.As soon as she learns the office routine, she will be an excellent assistant.Hawaii is an excellent tourist resort.He worked out an excellent idea.The store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.
她本可以成为杰出的教师。她一旦熟悉了办公室的日常事务,就会成为一名优秀的助手。夏威夷是极好的旅游胜地。他想出了一个极好的主意。该店买卖公平，声誉极佳。

translation: vt. 不计；把…除外vi. 反对prep. 除…之外conj. 除了；要不是
examples: They all went to sleep except me.It's a poor tune, except to be dancing to.They didn't open their mouths except to complain.I would buy the suit,except that it cost too much.You will all be punished; I can except no one.An admission fee is charged,but children are excepted.
除我之外，他们都去睡觉了。这支曲子不好,除非用它作舞蹈的伴奏曲。除了抱怨他们从不开口如果不是它价格太高的话,我本想买下那件衣服。你们全得受罚,我一个也不饶。收取入场费，但儿童除外。

translation: n. 借口；理由vt. 原谅；为…申辩；给…免去vi. 作为借口；请求宽恕；表示宽恕
examples: Excuse me, but I must say you are completely wrong.I hope you will excuse me if I have to leave early.He told a real whopper to excuse his lateness.His excuse for being late was that he had missed the train.Such conduct allows of no excuse.My lame excuse is that I have too much to do.I won't let him get away with that excuse.
对不起，但是我必须说你完全错了。如果我必须早些离开,希望你能原谅我。他撒了个大谎为自己的迟到辩解。他迟到的理由是没有赶上火车。这样的行为是不容辩解的。我那站不住脚的借口就是我要干的事太多了。我不会让他用那种借口蒙混过去。

translation: n. 运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼vt. 锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐vi. 运动；练习
examples: Exercise is good for your heart and lungs.I suggest you go on a diet and take more exercise.Next I'd like you to do the exercises on page 10.She does her piano exercises in the afternoon.The pupil's exercise was full of erasures.Should I hand in my exercise book tomorrow?You should learn how to exercise self-control.You can exercise your right as a citizen.You should try to exercise patience.You should exercise more so as to keep energetic.He exercises in the morning every day.
对您的心脏和肺,运动也是有益的。我建议你节食,多做运动。下面我让你做第10页上的练习。她每天下午练习钢琴。这个学生的作业练习到处都是擦拭的痕迹。我是否该明天交作业？你要学会运用自制力。你能行使公民权利。你应当努力运用忍耐力。你应当多锻炼以保持精力充沛。他每天早晨锻炼。

translation: vt. 期望；指望；认为；预料vi. 期待；预期
examples: This is what we expect to happen.He is expected to get through to the finals.At last they got the telegram they had been expecting.
这就是我们所预期将会发生的。我们期待他进入决赛。最后他们收到了他们盼望的电报。

translation: n. 远征；探险队；迅速
examples: They equipped themselves for the expedition.They planned to organize a scientific expedition.He is the commander of the expedition.The expedition suffered all the rigors of a Canadian winter.The mail is conveyed with expedition.We strived to work with great expedition.
他们为远征治装。他们计划组织一次科学考察。他是探险队的队长。这支探险队饱受了加拿大严冬的折磨。那封信被迅速地传递出去。我们力求工作迅速。

translation: adj. 昂贵的；花钱的
examples: The dress is too expensive for me to buy.A cheaper camera is not always inferior to a more expensive one.This set of crystal wine cups is very expensive.The overhead costs are ridiculously expensive.It is more expensive to go by plane than by boat.
那衣服太昂贵，我买不起。廉价照相机的质量并总不比昂贵的差。这套水晶玻璃酒杯非常昂贵。日常开支太高了。坐飞机去比坐船去的费用更高一些。

translation: n. 经验；经历；体验vt. 经验；经历；体验
examples: He has had no previous experience in this kind of job.I know from my own experience how difficult the work can be.I had a singular experience in Africa.The shipwreck was a harrowing experience.You will experience a dream of fantasy.Today I'm going to experience the slide activities.He experienced a pang of sadness.
他从前没有做这种工作的经验。从我自己的经验我明白这项工作会有多难。我在非洲时有过一次奇特的经历。那次船难是一个惨痛的经历。你将会经历一个梦幻之旅。今天我要体验一下滑行项目。他感到一阵悲痛。

translation: adj. 熟练的；内行的；老练的n. 专家；行家；能手vt. 当专家；在…中当行家n. (Expert)人名；(法)埃克斯佩
examples: She is a reputable expert.According to expert opinions, they gave up the experiment immediately.He is an expert in unarmed combat.The surgeon cut away the tumour with expert skill.To her expert eye, the painting was terrible.Could you give me your expert advice?
她是个有声望的专家。根据专家们的意见，他们马上放弃了这项试验。他是徒手格斗的能手。外科大夫用熟练的技术把肿瘤切去。她以内行的眼光看，这幅画糟透了。你可以给我一些专业意见吗?

translation: vt. 探索；探测；探险vi. 探索；探测；探险
examples: The experts are exploring every part of the island.He had an itch to get away and explore.Can you explore the market possibility for us?Columbus discovered America but did not explore the new continent.Let us explore the possibilities for improvement.
专家们正在勘查这个岛的各个部分。他等不及要动身去探险。您能为我们考察一下市场前景吗？哥伦布发现了美洲让我们探索改善的可能性。

translation: n. 探险家；勘探者；探测器；[医]探针
examples: The explorer mapped the new territory .This famous explorer finally died in loneliness.Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers.The explorer told the boys about his adventures in the Arctic.
那位探测者绘制那块新土地的地图。这位著名的探险家最后在孤寂中死去。克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家。那位探险家把他在北极的冒险活动讲给男孩子们听。

translation: n. 眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点vt. 注视，看n. (Eye)人名；(德)艾厄；(英)艾
examples: He could not meet his father's eye.She reads with a sharp eye for idiom.He has weak eyes.Reading in the sunlight does harm to your eye sight.We're eye to eye on all the vital issues.To my eye, the decorations are excellent.You do have an eye for paintings.Though he majored in science at university, he has an eye for art and literature.Kevin likes to eye every girl who walks by.They eyed every change in the stock market.I did not like the way he eyed me.
他不敢正视父亲的目光。她阅读时以敏锐的目光审视语言的习惯用法。他的视力不佳。在太阳光下读书对视力有害。对于重大问题我们的观点一致就我的观点，这些装饰品都很好你的确对油画有很高的鉴赏力。尽管他在大学学的是理科,他却对艺术和文学很有鉴赏力。凯文喜欢看每一个走过他面前的女孩子。他们密切注视股票市场的每一个变化。我不喜欢他那看我的样子。

translation: 彼此，互相
examples: They took out their resentments on each other.The teams are all square at one match each.Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.
他们互相发泄怨气。这些队在各自参加了一场比赛后不分胜负。法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师。

translation: 过得快乐，过得快活
examples: This means that you enjoy having a good time.I hope you'll enjoy yourselves.
也就是说，你喜欢玩得快乐。希望你们玩得高兴。

translation: 即使；虽然
examples: They couldn't, even if they would, get out of trouble by themselves.Even if I fail this time, I would try again.We should practice economy even if we are rich.We'll go even if it rains.Even if one graduated from college, he should still continue to learn.Even if he said so, you need not believe him.Even if it will take me six weeks, I am determined to finish the job.He's a real gentleman,even if a little pompous at times.Even if after meeting only once, they felt a kinship.Even if air is invisible, air takes up space.
即使他们想(摆脱), 也无法独立摆脱困难。即使我这次失败了，我还要再试试。即使我们富裕了也仍应该厉行节约。即使下雨我们也要去。即使大学毕业了他也要继续学习。即使他这么说，你大可不必相信他。即使这工作要花掉我六个星期的时间，我仍决心要把它完成。他可是个正人君子他们虽然只见了一面,但已是一见如故了。空气虽然看不见,但它占据了空间。

translation: 虽然，即使
examples: We mustn't let up, even though we're winning.The poster wouldn't stick even though I drenched it with glue.He never apologizes, even though he knows that he is in the wrong.Even though he tried, he still lagged behind other runners.I took the liberty of reading the letter, even though it was addressed to you.
我们即使快赢了也决不可松劲。我涂了大量胶水，可那张海报就是贴不住。他从不道歉，即使他自知错了。尽管他努力了，仍落在其他赛跑者之后。尽管这封信是写给你的，但是我冒昧地看过了。

translation: adv. 从那时到现在
examples: She's been piling up money ever since she got the job.We've been friends ever since we met at school.Fog dispersal research has since followed the line.Since then, Goldman has been on a green jag.
自从得了那份工作以来，她一直在攒钱。自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。自那时以来消雾研究一直遵循这个方向。自那时以来，高盛一直在绿色联合咨询组。
